mapper.select: select Product.*, piPath, pcName from Product INNER JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE on (Product.pNo=PRODUCT_IMAGE.pNo) INNER JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY ON (Product.pcNo=PRODUCT_CATEGORY.pcNo)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT pNO, COUNT(*) cellCount FROM ORDERS WHERE ODATE >= SYSDATE-7 GROUP BY PNO UNION SELECT pNO, COUNT(*) cellCount FROM GUEST_ORDERS WHERE GODATE >= SYSDATE-7 GROUP BY PNO) GROUP BY PNO, CELLCOUNT) gp INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON (PRODUCT.PNO=gp.PNO) INNER JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE on (Product.pNo=PRODUCT_IMAGE.pNo) INNER JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY ON (Product.pcNo=PRODUCT_CATEGORY.pcNo) LEFT JOIN (SELECT PNO, COUNT(*) maxBookMark FROM BOOKMARK GROUP BY PNO) mbm ON (mbm.PNO=gp.PNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT PNO, COUNT(*) reviewMax FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW GROUP BY PNO) rm ON (rm.PNO=gp.PNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT PNO, COUNT(*) inQuerywMax FROM PRODUCT_INQUERY GROUP BY PNO) im ON (im.PNO=gp.PNO) ORDER BY CELLCOUNT DESC
